text: When doing a complete rebuild/redesign, what is your preference? Content Staging Site or Developer Sandbox?

In think that depends on the stage of the project. First, Alpha Versions and Testing of new modules can happen in a sandbox where no client is able to see unfinished or half optimised modules / templates. However, once that is approved, i think transfering it to the client and using the Content Staging to stage the new site with content is the way to go.

Makes sense!

I am sorta new here.. I have a question. Is is easy to transfer from my sandbox to client staging site?

So build a bunch of stuff in sandbox, then add to staging?
not sure, never used it before, also, sandbox are only available for certain tiers i think

You don't really need a sandbox imo. You can have all the new files/module/templates  in the same portal as the live site and just use content staging. It's not gonna affect the live site. And you can disable any module/template you don't want people seeing
Are there devs on here for hire?
Yep, you can find them and also post your job you're hiring for in the <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> channel
